website_summaries.verdict: Game includes 135 cards with questions that are appropriate conversation starters for all generations in the family.
pros: Cards come in a neat cube for easy portability and storage
Questions are designed for family members to share opinions and also some personal history
Questions may springboard into other topics
cons: May not be the best choice for a family members with a "rough" past

customer_reviews.title: This is fun for adults
customer_reviews.text: This is fun for adults. The questions aren't really great for kids. And for the love of all that is holy, why isn't there any freaking punctuation? PUNCTUATION MATTERS!
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Caution
customer_reviews.text: Great game but, I would purchase with caution. If your family has had some rough history, this may just reopen some old wounds... possibly even ones you weren't aware existed.
customer_reviews.author: Penthesilea

customer_reviews.title: Too many similar questions in each deck, expensive, and not creative
customer_reviews.text: This company lacks vision and creativity. The 50% of the cards are mundane and boring. And with other decks overlap way too many questions. I think I bought 15 decks, and I am really disappointed. The price is way too high, the decks are heavy and the acrylic case will crack very easily. As a matter of fact 80% of the decks were already cracked when I received the products over two different orders. I think the cards are useful, but the price/performance ratio is not that great. The price should be reduced and the company should think outside of their box.
customer_reviews.author: S. J. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great fo further family bonding!
customer_reviews.text: I introduced this game during our Thanksgiving dinner. When I mentioned it there was a lot of eye rolling and I knew everyone just thought they would humor me by with a couple of questions and that would be it forever more. When we ended the game everyone had really enjoyed it, from ages 93 to 25. In fact, they wanted to play again later in the day!
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Candage

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift. The content is excellent and the box is elegant looking! It has changed our family dynamic.
customer_reviews.text: I totally love this!! It is worth every dollar. The content is excellent and the box is elegant looking. It has changed our family dynamic. We now make a point - approx. once a week - of putting down our cell phones during a family dinner to just sit around and schmooze.....and it's all thanks to TableTopics. Everyone in the family (sometimes even my teenager!) has a great time with this. I plan to buy some of the other versions...
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Good for friends and family gatherings
customer_reviews.text: I passed these out at our Easter brunch. We have a large blended family, and many times people will chat with others they know best. We had so much fun learning things about each other. Even family members that have known each other for a lifetime found out new things. I had several people tell me how much they liked doing this.
customer_reviews.author: DD McC

customer_reviews.title: Nice way to keep generations connected
customer_reviews.text: After some resistance from the younger folks at our Thanksgiving dinner, almost everyone joined in and some of the younger folks asked to continue with questions. This was a great way to keep the conversation going between generations.
customer_reviews.author: boomerpsyc

customer_reviews.title: Great conversation starters!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these! We have the family version as well. I have three boys 8,10 and 12 and it does get them talking. At first I had to pull them out and push it on them but after a few times they started to grab them before me. It's great for kids because sometimes talking about their video games doesn't hold enough interest and we do need to communicate with our kids.
customer_reviews.author: C. Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Quality is excellent. Questions are about family which is ok but I was expecting questions appropriate for family. The questions are about family which could be loaded if you had a recent death in the family or if you have an evil grandma who thinks the game is point based and all favorite memories should be about her. Overall, decent, but I would buy something more general if I was to make the purchase today.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: The cards are well-made and the packaging is nice. However
customer_reviews.text: The cards are well-made and the packaging is nice. However, the questions are rather intense for a family holiday party, which is why I bought it. I read a few cards and people were not that into it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A. Rosati

customer_reviews.title: Took this on a family trip with my parents and grown kids... AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic with multiple generations in the room. Age appropriate family stories... it promotes knowing the history of the family. HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS GAME!!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: Love these cards! Used them on Thanksgiving when we had family visiting from out of state. This bunch is often arguing with each other, and these discussion cards really helped us stay focused on positive conversation and getting to know more about each other. Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: "Mama" from CO

customer_reviews.title: Great Family Conversation Starter
customer_reviews.text: I actually saw a different brand advertised and considered purchasing, but then saw this item in the compare similar items. LOVED that I purchased this one. More questions and a better price than the other brand. We have had great times talking over dinner when my family gets together. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Angie H.

customer_reviews.title: We've had some really fantastic family conversations that have been sparked by these cards
customer_reviews.text: We keep these right on the kitchen table and read at least one every evening at dinner. We've had some really fantastic family conversations that have been sparked by these cards. Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: K. J. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Tabletopics is Great Conversation Starter
customer_reviews.text: Tabletopics is fantastic! Our 4 generation family loves it. We played it at Thanksgiving and Christmas and look forward to the next gathering.
customer_reviews.author: God's girl

customer_reviews.title: great question
customer_reviews.text: questions comes in a clear, heavy plastic box. The questions are very good and we had an excellent time going around the table and talking. The questions helped us move to related topics, so we are well pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Let’s talk stories.
customer_reviews.text: This is good for conversational group discussion. It makes you really thing about what is ask. Kept us in conversation for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Maile

customer_reviews.title: Good Laughs and Discussion starters
customer_reviews.text: Ordered and used the Tabletopics Family Gathering during a Family Reunion and everyone enjoyed answering and getting to know each other better. Had some good laughs and great discussions as well. Highly recommend and ready to purchase other TableTopics.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonite

customer_reviews.title: Great conversation starter
customer_reviews.text: This is the best way to start a conversation between all age groups. It brings friends and families together. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids & adults
customer_reviews.text: Great deck, my girls (10 & 7) love playing this during dinner. The questions are easy to understand, but still thought-provoking. It really does prompt great conversation. I had this deck already, but purchased this one as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: JaimeShopsHere

customer_reviews.title: Starts conversation
customer_reviews.text: Some of the questions are little dumb. I even found one question that repeated itself. Overall, it does bring good conversation.
customer_reviews.author: Prissygirl93631

customer_reviews.title: Boring, Dont Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Did not find this to be as fun as Oprah promoted. After you get through the questions and discussions the first time its even less appealing. Don't purchase - Boring.
customer_reviews.author: Doughty Family

customer_reviews.title: Lots of laughs
customer_reviews.text: I brought these just out Curiosity We have a large family We use it at our last gathering We were in tears of laughter At times in suspense of what was asked and when they answered Lots of fun I even post a question on my FB page to to see what ppl response will be
customer_reviews.author: cx2

customer_reviews.title: A MUST GET
customer_reviews.text: If you want to reconnect with your kids and spouse this is a must get. They love it as a game, and its a great way to push families to share.
customer_reviews.author: Zenitram

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my sister-in-law and my nieces and nephews. They said it was a great game that they enjoyed playing together ansld that it created some grest bonds as they answered the questions.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: Order arrived prompt as expected Product was as described by the seller . Perfect for someone who has everything and for holiday parties.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great family fun
customer_reviews.text: This has become a family favorite at meal times. Helps my twenty year olds engage, reminisce, and share.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bonding Game
customer_reviews.text: This game is a blast. A great way to connect, understand, and fully engage with people!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Girard

customer_reviews.title: It’s fun!
customer_reviews.text: So fun! We had a blast with the questions... that lead to great conversations.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad and his house and have it sitting in the middle of his table. It's so convenient to just be able to pull out a card and start asking questions randomly when the conversation is dying down!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Good discussion starters
customer_reviews.text: This set has good questions for my family which includes my brother and I who are 25-35 year adults living on our own and my mom and step-dad.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Conversation Aid
customer_reviews.text: This is a very simple way to start meaningful discussion on a large range of topics. We have used it to teach children to participate in family discussions and to encourage shy people to participate.
customer_reviews.author: G McGlasson

customer_reviews.title: Great game for everyone
customer_reviews.text: We had a great time getting to know each other better playing this game
customer_reviews.author: Denver Renee

customer_reviews.title: Lots of questions were fun we just passed over the ones we were not ...
customer_reviews.text: Lots of questions were fun we just passed over the ones we were not interested and their were very few of those.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: It dropped out of the bag and crashed on the tile floor and the case broke--not a big deal but cheap!! The product is great and the kids and parents are already having fun.
customer_reviews.author: sjba1964

customer_reviews.title: Love these, family loves them too!
customer_reviews.text: We live these. Make for a great family time discussion at our dinner table.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Rincon

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Good questions but they are all too similar. Gets repetitive.
customer_reviews.author: Pfair

customer_reviews.title: as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived within days of ordering. No damages. This is for a wedding gift on a bridal registry. I have a smaller version of this that came in a kids meal that we use all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Annette P.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for family events!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a surprise gift for my grandmother. Other family members loved it so much they asked for their own set. I also purchased a set of a different topic for my own household; I love random questions!
customer_reviews.author: PipsGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great for family fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my dad. We play at famu gatherings. It has been really fun!
customer_reviews.author: Meggie Jax

customer_reviews.title: Good for family gatherings of young to older family members
customer_reviews.text: Good for family gatherings of young to older family members. But, not the deep questions that I found in The Complete Book of Questions, Poole.

customer_reviews.title: Party Time!
customer_reviews.text: Great fun for a get together ... promotes lively and thoughtful conversation !

customer_reviews.title: but this is a great game.
customer_reviews.text: First one came damaged so we had to exchange, but this is a great game.

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: Great activity for the holidays; kept the conversations going and civilized.

customer_reviews.title: I love Table Topics!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as a gift for my sister. I already have a set and she loves it, so asked for one for her birthday. Table Topics are so fun!

customer_reviews.title: At age 31, I learned new things about my parents
customer_reviews.text: Had a great time with these over the holidays. I thought I knew everything about my parents at age 31, but new stories came out right away!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy cards and have great questions. The case is awesome!

customer_reviews.title: Great ice breaker!
customer_reviews.text: Great game for friends and family. We leave ours out on the coffee table and it almost always gets picked up and sparks great conversation during any social gathering.

customer_reviews.title: Great conversation starter
customer_reviews.text: This game is great to get to know people. People love to tell their story

customer_reviews.title: Great reviews from the family I gifted this to
customer_reviews.text: Great reviews from the family I gifted this to. They said the cards resulted in the best family conversations ever. They are entertaining and fun too!

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT TOOL IN THE CLASSROOM
customer_reviews.text: I'm using these cards as a linguistic activity for my pupils studying English. The themes are most dynamic and provide food for thought for everyone. They are suitable for levels as from intermediate upwards.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These cards have some great topics! We can't wait to have all the kids over to use them!

customer_reviews.title: Interesting Family Fun
customer_reviews.text: Family reluctantly played; enjoyed. But, it did stir up some things. haha!

customer_reviews.title: Fun family game
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Thanksgiving and we had a lot of fun! The ages ranged from 7 to 60 and everyone was laughing. We all learned things about each other that we never knew!
customer_reviews.author: SueZin

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for our first "family reunion" and it was the ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our first "family reunion" and it was the highlight of our night. Opens up a variety of conversations as well as brings insight to family history.

customer_reviews.title: Getting to know you - cards with questions for families
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful conversation starter for families. Each card asks a question that prompts memories that are then shared amongst the group. Used them at the most recent family gathering and we had the wonderful opportunity to get to know each other on a deeper level.

customer_reviews.title: Fun conversation starters

customer_reviews.title: Great Family Game

Grandchildren, cousins, siblings, parets, uncles, aunts, great uncles and aunts, distant cousins, even relatives visiting from other countries. We had a blast...and look forward to the next family get together to continue playing

customer_reviews.title: There are other versions as well.

customer_reviews.text: Bought for a Christmas gift and was very pleased. Shipped quickly and love the look of this product. Recommend.this for anyone who wants to get the conversation started and enjoys a good time with family and friends.

customer_reviews.title: Best Game!!

customer_reviews.title: Great for family events
customer_reviews.text: Family enjoyed them. Gave everyone the chance to open up.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Ice Breaker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help break the ice at some holiday family gatherings. It's really cool to get the family and friends talking and reminiscing. Great addition for any event.
customer_reviews.author: JesJones

customer_reviews.title: Good game for a family gathering!
customer_reviews.text: This game was great for a family gathering. It helped get conversations started; especially fun to hear stories from parents and grandparents. Could be used for non-family conversation, too.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons REQUEST this activity at the dinner table themselves!
customer_reviews.author: Michael P

customer_reviews.title: A favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Great conversation starter...one of my kids often will pull a card to read at dinnertime. The questions are relevant with some fun and others thought provoking. It's a wonderful way for parents to discuss their ethical and moral values without being "preachy". This will have a permanent place on our kitchen table. Great for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: jconsi

customer_reviews.title: Great for Gatherings
customer_reviews.text: Great thing to have around the house to engage everyone in conversation. It's amazing the things you learn about people you've known all your life.
customer_reviews.author: JCW

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It's a great Idea for a small or large dinner party entertainment. We'll recomend to everyone! Thank you! Kiddy Hamman!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love these Table Topic questions. This one doesn't disappoint
customer_reviews.author: Craig Smith

customer_reviews.title: Conversation starters
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to bridge the generation gap the young get to hear stories of older family members and immediately compare them to their own experiences. Don't be too quick to rush to the next card sometimes it only takes a few cards not the whole deck. Let the conversations happen and be sure to listen. It's a great way to learn what the young ones are remembering and valuing too.
customer_reviews.author: Gael M Scott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best Christmas gift that I ever gave or received.
customer_reviews.author: J. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great Conversation Starters~
customer_reviews.text: These are great conversation starters. This way you can hear everyone at the table instead of just a few people doing all the talking. You get to know people better~

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable Tabletopics Family Gathering
customer_reviews.text: This is a great conversation starters for family reunions and get-togethers. It also jogs some of those old memories.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great at the table, especially when friends of the teens are visiting
customer_reviews.author: J. Modica

customer_reviews.title: and all of us enjoyed the conversations it generated
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this game for a trip back "home" for the holidays, when all the family would be present. We played one evening with the grandparents, and all of us enjoyed the conversations it generated. It gave the elders a chance to share family stories with those of us who may not have heard them, and we got a lot of great laughter. It's perfect for family gatherings.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Edge Patton

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Always looking for new ways to entertain & enjoy quality time with friends & family. I came across this and bought immediately for Christmas. Great idea & great conversation starter.
customer_reviews.author: Healthy Nut

customer_reviews.title: Fun for our family
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our family table and we have loved pulling the questions. The cards have led o some very good conversations that go deeper than "how was your day?". The questions are family -oriented and it has been interesting to see what our kids think of our family life nd how they see our family as different from other families.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Mudd

customer_reviews.title: Great conversational game without the competition
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these - one as a gift. The recipient has already played it 3 times in 3 weeks.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: No awkward lulls in conversation when you have this available.

customer_reviews.title: These are Great

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great conversation starter

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Very interesting questions - just run through them for your particular gathering. One of the first questions I came across was a question about what deceased relative you enjoy remembering... My grandparents just passed a few months ago and my husband's grandfather just passed last year. Not a good question for us at this time.

customer_reviews.title: Table Topics Family Gathering
customer_reviews.text: Helps get the conversations started that allows the family to remininsce. Gives young and old the chance to contribute to the conversation. A fun activity for all.

customer_reviews.title: Great for awkward silences at the family dinner table!
customer_reviews.text: Played this at the dinner table with my family. Provided great conversations starters!

customer_reviews.title: questions areg to just okay
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a road trip with family and friends. About 1/2 of the questions are actually interesting to discuss. The rest are boring or don't generate any interesting conversation.

customer_reviews.title: Family Playing Cards
customer_reviews.text: I have bought other cards in this series, but this particular one is bland and dull. I would take another look before purchasing.

customer_reviews.title: lots of fun

customer_reviews.text: but, you know my family does already talk.... I think we can write our own cards to be more fun.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: These are so fun to have for everyday family time or when company comes over. Great conversation starters!

product_meta.title: TABLETOPICS Family Gathering: Questions to Start Great Conversations
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Build a bridge across generations with memorable conversation starters that are perfect for any family gathering. TableTopics Family Gathering Edition will help you start a new tradition around the "extended" family table and give young and old alike a chance to share. These questions are designed to encourage conversations between grandparents and grandchildren, aunts and uncles with their nieces and nephews, all the cousins too; the whole family. It's perfect for reunions, holiday gatherings and special family events. These fun, family ice breaker questions are a great birthday or anniversary gift idea too! Ask questions like "who in your family met someone famous" and "what's the biggest technological change you've seen in your lifetime." Recommended for all ages. 4-inch acrylic cube with 135 questions.
feature_bullets: Build a bridge across generations with memorable conversation starters that are perfect for any family gathering
Perfect for reunions, holiday gatherings and special family events
Questions are designed to encourage conversations between the whole family
These fun, family ice breaker questions are a great birthday or anniversary gift idea too

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars333 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
